## R Markdown

```{r}

# front-matter
rm(list = ls()) #clear the workspace

# load the typical libraries
library(Stat2Data)
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(ggformula)
library(Lock5Data)
library(tinytex)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(car)

data <- read_excel("C:/Users/20lee/Downloads/CookieDataStacked.xlsx")

```

```{r}
favstats(data$Diameter);
```

```{r}
boxplot(data$Diameter, main="Diameter of Cookies in cm", sub="Figure 1: Boxplot of diameter")
plot(data$Diameter, main="Diameter of Cookies in cm", sub="Figure 1: Plot of diameter")

```

```{r}
boxplot(Diameter ~ Fat, data=data, main="Diameter of Cookies by Fat in cm", sub="Figure 2: Boxplot of diameter by fat")
```

```{r}
model <- aov(Diameter ~ Fat * Flour * ChillTime, data=data)
AIC(model)
```
